name: The Little Saci
description:
The Little Saci

A mystical being and protector of the forest, a boy who cut his own leg to escape from slavery and now he performs pranks on people. The objective of the game is to perform the largest number of pranks and steal the largest number of objects from humans without being caught. Saci always laugh after doing the pranks.

 

Game Play

The gameplay will be simple and with few controls, using the arrows to move and a certain button for each ability that the character has. The objective is to run around the map and be able to carry out the largest number of pranks and thefts without being caught by humans. You lose the game if captured by humans and to finish the game level you must perform a minimum amount of thefts and pranks.

 

Pranks

  • Turn off the lights at night.
  • Open the gates of the pasture and scare oxen and horses.
  • Break the cart load brakes.
  • It makes small objects disappear. (scissors, hammers, shuffle wool).
  • Breaking chicken eggs.

 

Skills

  • You can use a whistle to stun / frighten humans to run.
  • Wear the red hat to appear and disappear in different places.
  • Escape from humans using whirlwind.

The player starts with only one skill which is the whistle, to acquire more skills you must perform a certain amount of actions within the game.

 

Target Audience

The game is simple and will be made for any age capable of using a device to play.

Level Design

To finish the game level it is necessary to perform a certain amount of thefts and pranks. Player skills are only released when you perform a certain amount of steals and pranks, an amount will be determined for each skill. Humans will follow you when you reach a certain distance from them, you must dodge humans or use your skills to distract them to not be captured.
